Text: To correct the wording in the above discription September was the MONTH that Germany invaded Poland, which of course began on September 1, 1939. By the time of this broadcast on Thursday September 21, 1939 the "world's eyes were on Europe, where a long-feared war moved into its fourth week. Americans' eyes were on Washington, where a joint session of Congress prepared to convene to hear an address from the President to clarify US neutrality policy. The day was clear, the temperatures mild."
